node.display_long_description:
Until You Fall is an arcade-inspired VR hack-and-slash roguelite that will force you to find and master your own fighting style for hours of frantic, kinetic fun.

Prepare for the fight of your life. Move your arms and body to the synthwave soundtrack as you attack, block, cast spells, and dodge your way deeper into the heart of a neon fantasy world filled with magic-infused monsters. Equip yourself with a variety of gameplay-altering weapons as you continue to gain strength and strike down the monstrosities that lurk throughout this mystifying world.

Features
+ Each run features randomized rewards, powerups, enemy configurations, and rooms - no two runs are quite the same
+ Arm yourself with a selection of powerful weapons and charge into battle with your own unique fighting style
+ Driving synthwave soundtrack keeps you moving in and out of the game
+ Customizable comfort and accessibility options help you move and battle comfortably in VR

The game is in English only.

node.reviewDescription:
I saw people play this game on YouTube, and it looked like a dream. Once I got the game on my Quest 2, it did not at all disappoint. 

You start off with two weapons, and you have to choose a difficulty and slice, block, and dodge your way through a gauntlet of enemies that progressively become more difficult, as well as more smart. Along the way you will have to choose upgrades in the form of crushing crystals, which can give you a leg up against the enemies. The enemies and level placements are procedurly generated, making each run feel fresh. Gameplay is superb... but what about the graphics?

The graphics look... pretty good overall. Definatly great for the quest. The lighting and vibrancy looks GEORGIOUS on the system, and you can tell they put effort in porting this game. The models of yourself and the enemies look amazing, and my only gripe is the low resolution on the textures on the ground, surrounding landscape, and the red crystal at the end of each level is pretty low res, but other than that it looks great, especially since you get the PC version included if you want to hook up your quest to your PC via link or virtual desktop (im sure its great I've yet to try XD) 

But there's one more thing about this game i have yet to touch on...

THE FITNESS

Oooh my gosh this game is an amazing workout.  When you get into the "Challenging" difficulty and above, this game will destroy you if you actually try XD. In 30 minutes, I burned over 220 calories, and im only 110 pounds! The best part is that it's such a fun game, you don't even realize that your working out, so it doesn't feel tedious... however the face pad may be completely drenched in sweat when your done, so either sanitize it after or buy the VR cover facial interface. 

Overall, so far this is one of if not my favorite game on quest. HIGHLY reccomend!
node.reviewTitle: Incredible. Stop hesitating and buy it!

website_page_meta.description: Fantasy and synthwave collide in this physically active VR sword fighting game. Grow stronger as you battle through an awesome neon environment and strike down magic-infused monstrosities in this hack-and-slash roguelite. Fight. Fall. Rise Again.
website_page_meta.title: Until You Fall · Oculus Quest
